1 #include "propellerimage.h"
2 
3 PropellerImage::PropellerImage(QByteArray image, QString filename)
4 {
5  EEPROM_SIZE = 32768;
6 
7  _image = image;
8  _filename = filename;
9  _clkmodesettings = initClockModeSettings();
10  _type = imageType();
11 
12  _typenames[Invalid] = "Invalid";
13  _typenames[Binary] = "Binary";
14  _typenames[Eeprom] = "EEPROM";
15 }
16 
17 quint8 PropellerImage::checksum()
18 {
19  int checksum = 0;
20  foreach (unsigned char c, _image)
21  {
22  checksum += c;
23  }
24 
25  // Add value of initial call frame
26  if (_type == Binary)
27  checksum += 2 * (0xff + 0xff + 0xff + 0xf9);
28 
29  checksum &= 0xff;
30 
31  return checksum;
32 }
33 
34 QByteArray PropellerImage::data()
35 {
36  return _image;
37 }

40  Q_UNUSED(data);
41 }

43 bool PropellerImage::isValid()
44 {
45  return (_type != Invalid);
46 }

52 int PropellerImage::imageSize()
53 {
54  return _image.size();
55 }

63 int PropellerImage::programSize()
64 {
65  return startOfStackSpace();
66 }
67 
68 int PropellerImage::variableSize()
69 {
70  return startOfStackSpace() - 8 - startOfVariables();
71 }
72 
73 int PropellerImage::stackSize()
74 {
75  return EEPROM_SIZE - startOfStackSpace();
76 }
77 
82 quint16 PropellerImage::startOfCode()
83 {
84  int start = readWord(6);
85 
86  if (start != 0x0010)
87  qDebug() << "Code start is invalid!";
88 
89  return start;
90 }
91 
96 quint16 PropellerImage::startOfVariables()
97 {
98  return readWord(8);
99 }
100 
105 quint16 PropellerImage::startOfStackSpace()
106 {
107  return readWord(10);
108 }

129 quint8 PropellerImage::readByte(int pos)
130 {
131  return (quint8) _image.at(pos);
132 }
133 
144 quint16 PropellerImage::readWord(int pos)
145 {
146  return (readByte(pos)) +
147  (readByte(pos+1) << 8);
148 }
149 
160 quint32 PropellerImage::readLong(int pos)
161 {
162  return (readByte(pos)) +
163  (readByte(pos+1) << 8) +
164  (readByte(pos+2) << 16) +
165  (readByte(pos+3) << 24);
166 }
167 
174 quint32 PropellerImage::clockFrequency()
175 {
176  return readLong(0x0);
177 }
178 
179 quint8 PropellerImage::clockMode()
180 {
181  quint8 clkmode = readByte(4);
182  if (_clkmodesettings.contains(clkmode))
183  return clkmode;
184  else
185  return 0x80;
186 }
187 
188 QString PropellerImage::clockModeText()
189 {
190  return _clkmodesettings.value(clockMode());
191 }
192 
193 QHash<quint8, QString> PropellerImage::initClockModeSettings()
194 {
195  QHash<quint8, QString> clkmode;
196 
197  clkmode[0x00] = "RCFAST";
198  clkmode[0x01] = "RCSLOW";
199  clkmode[0x22] = "XINPUT";
200  clkmode[0x2A] = "XTAL1";
201  clkmode[0x32] = "XTAL2";
202  clkmode[0x3A] = "XTAL3";
203 
204  clkmode[0x63] = "XINPUT+PLL1X";
205  clkmode[0x64] = "XINPUT+PLL2X";
206  clkmode[0x65] = "XINPUT+PLL4X";
207  clkmode[0x66] = "XINPUT+PLL8X";
208  clkmode[0x67] = "XINPUT+PLL16X";
209 
210  clkmode[0x6B] = "XTAL1+PLL1X";
211  clkmode[0x6C] = "XTAL1+PLL2X";
212  clkmode[0x6D] = "XTAL1+PLL4X";
213  clkmode[0x6E] = "XTAL1+PLL8X";
214  clkmode[0x6F] = "XTAL1+PLL16X";
215 
216  clkmode[0x73] = "XTAL2+PLL1X";
217  clkmode[0x74] = "XTAL2+PLL2X";
218  clkmode[0x75] = "XTAL2+PLL4X";
219  clkmode[0x76] = "XTAL2+PLL8X";
220  clkmode[0x77] = "XTAL2+PLL16X";
221 
222  clkmode[0x7B] = "XTAL3+PLL1X";
223  clkmode[0x7C] = "XTAL3+PLL2X";
224  clkmode[0x7D] = "XTAL3+PLL4X";
225  clkmode[0x7E] = "XTAL3+PLL8X";
226  clkmode[0x7F] = "XTAL3+PLL16X";
227 
228  clkmode[0x80] = "INVALID";
229 
230  return clkmode;
231 }

233 QString PropellerImage::fileName()
234 {
235  return _filename;
236 }
237 
238 PropellerImage::ImageType PropellerImage::imageType()
239 {
240  if (_image.isEmpty())
241  {
242  _type = Invalid;
243  }
244  else if (_image.size() % 4 != 0)
245  {
246  _type = Invalid;
247  }
248  else if (_image.size() > EEPROM_SIZE)
249  {
250  _type = Invalid;
251  }
252  else
253  {
254  if (imageSize() > programSize())
255  _type = Eeprom;
256  else
257  _type = Binary;
258  }
259 
260  if (checksum())
261  {
262  _type = Invalid;
263  }
264  return _type;
265 }
266 
267 QString PropellerImage::imageTypeText()
268 {
269  return _typenames[_type];
270 }
